Key Match Events: USA won a thrilling super-over to seal a famous victory against Pakistan in the T20 World Cup

The USA appeared to be cruising in reply, as they reached 104 for one in the 14th over. Captain Patel’s 38-ball 50 and Andries Gous’s 35 off 26 deliveries left them needing 56 to win off 44 balls. However, after Monank was dismissed in the 15th over it needed a six from Jones in the final over and a four from Kumar off the last delivery to tie the match and force the super over.
Post-Match Reflections: The USA’s captain, Monank Patel, said he hoped the win would “open many doors” for the game in the country.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Both sides face India in New York in their next matches, with Pakistan playing on Sunday and the USA next Wednesday.
Others: The USA, who beat Canada by seven wickets in their first match on Saturday, appeared to be cruising in reply, as they reached 104 for one in the 14th over.
